name: Stick-Drift
description:
Stick-Drift is a single-player racing game where you are stuck in a car that is forever doomed to move forward and left and is constantly accelerating! The only control you have over the vehicle is to hold the SPACEBAR which will cause the car to turn right instead. Good luck! My best time is 45s.

All 3D models are taken from 

Kenney. (https://t.co/7dGEMiDPWD?amp=1) 

Music is credited to Kevin Macleod

Upbeat Forever by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5011-upbeat-forever
